text:
[Verse]
Under the sky so wide
Stars begin to hide
Silent whispers glide
Feel the moonlight ride

[Verse 2]
Shadows start to dance
In the soft night's trance
Lost in this romance
Take a chance take a glance

[Chorus]
Moonlight dreams they blaze
Through the night they phase
In a mystic haze
We drift through silver rays

[Verse 3]
Hearts begin to sway
As night turns to day
In the milky way
We chase the stars away

[Bridge]
Feel the night ignite
In this gentle light
Everything feels right
Moon keeps us in sight

[Verse 4]
Waves begin to kiss
Shoreline's tender bliss
In this night we miss
Every single twist
title: Moonlight Dreams
